query: SELECT team, SUM(overall) as total_overall, COUNT(*) as player_count FROM players WHERE team = 'Hornets' GROUP BY team;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user waCuRew5RKYFFjj.root --database DS68jwRuNTWiz9tNrw6KXW --execute SELECT team, SUM(overall) as total_overall, COUNT(*) as player_count FROM players WHERE team = 'Hornets' GROUP BY team;
